DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect MCS® compare placebo reduce risk biopsy-detectable prostate cancer high-risk subject 104 week ( 24 month ) treatment .
DOC.brief_title: To Evaluate Effect MCS® Prostate Cancer Prevention
DOC.criteria: 1. highrisk subject prostate cancer . 2 . Male subject age 50 75 year old . 3 . Subject able understand willing comply study procedure sign informed consent form ( ICF ) . 1 . Subjects take longterm hormonal agent may affect normal physiology sex hormone function . 2 . Subjects PSA > 10.0 ng/ml . 3 . Subjects history prostate cancer . 4 . Subject participate another investigational agent study past 30 day plan study period . 5 . Subjects consider ineligible study judge investigator .
